p: Individuals in virological failure do not reflect the current scenery of the HIV-1 epidemic, as these individuals were usually diagnosed and have already started antiretroviral therapy and thereby they are not in the recent infection phase. Thus, to have a more up-to-date parameter on the HIV-1 genetic diversity, viral sequencing of newly infected individuals should be performed. Moreover, it is observed that antiretroviral therapy acts on the natural selection of resistant strains, which may influence the evolutionary and phylogenetic analyses.
